description: Copy an CloudHSM cluster backup to a different region. Cross-account use: No. You cannot perform this operation on an CloudHSM backup in a different Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: DestinationRegion
parameters.description: The AWS region that will contain your copied CloudHSM cluster backup.

parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup that will be copied to the destination region.

parameters.name: TagList
parameters.description: Tags to apply to the destination backup during creation. If you specify tags, only these tags will be applied to the destination backup. If you do not specify tags, the service copies tags from the source backup to the destination backup. (dict) --- Contains a tag. A tag is a key-value pair. The key of the tag. The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: DestinationBackup
nested_items.description: Information on the backup that will be copied to the destination region, including CreateTimestamp, SourceBackup, SourceCluster, and Source Region. CreateTimestamp of the destination backup will be the same as that of the source backup.

nested_items.name: CreateTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when both the source backup was created.

nested_items.name: SourceRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS region that contains the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

nested_items.name: SourceBackup
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

nested_items.name: SourceCluster
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the cluster containing the source backup from which the new backup was copied.
